comment._content: John Edward Lamb (December 26, 1852 - August 23, 1914) was a U.S. Representative from Indiana. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_E._Lamb

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for the additional info. on Lamb.  We'll include his full name and occupation next time we update the description.
